TaxonIdentification.subspecies_name: 茶色薹草 ( 原亚种) cha se tai cao (yuan ya zhong)

treatment.description: Leaves rather narrow, 1.5–3 mm wide. Male spike 2–4 cm; female spikes 1–3 cm. Female glumes dark brown.
treatment.distribution: ● Sandy or rocky slopes in montane regions. Taiwan.
treatment.discussion: No specimens have been seen by the present authors.
